oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MODELING OP ENERGY TRANSFER AND UNDERTOW IN THE SURF ZONE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Okayasu, Akio
Watanabe, Akira
Isobe, Masahiko
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: energy transfer
modeling transfer
surf zone
undertow
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A model is presented to describe accurately the energy transfer under breaking waves. In the model, the energy of organized large vortexes as well as those of wave-induced motion and turbulence is taken into account. The model allows to estimate the dissipation rate and distribution of energy, and then the cross-shore two-dimensional distribution of an undertow. The applicability of the model is confirmed by laboratory experiments.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 22 (1990): Proceedings of 22nd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Delft, The Netherlands, 1990.
